+Company Overview

Rocky Mountain Oils (RMO) is a growing, fast-paced, direct-to-consumer eCommerce company operating in the essential oil, health, and wellness industry. RMO sells premium-grade essential oils to help families take control of their health and wellness. Our customers are looking for a premium experienceâ€”not only in the oils we deliver but also in our web properties and customer service. Every employee at Rocky Mountain Oils must be committed to this mission.



+Job Description

We are looking for a dedicated Amazon Brand Manager to help manage and grow our Amazon presence. This is a part-time remote position, perfect for someone experienced in Amazon Seller Central, PPC, and SEO who can work independently and deliver results.



+Duties & Responsibilities

As an Amazon Brand Manager, you will oversee the entire product lifecycle on the Amazon platform, including:

-Data & Performance Analysis: Monitor KPIs related to sales, customer reviews, and product performance; identify areas for improvement and implement corrective actions.

-Revenue Growth: Develop strategies to increase sales, including cross-selling and upselling opportunities.

-Product Launches: Plan and execute launch strategies for new products to ensure successful entry into the Amazon marketplace.

-Inventory Planning & Management: Prevent stock outs and minimize overstock by monitoring and adjusting inventory levels based on trends and seasonality.

-Forecasting: Develop accurate sales forecasts and collaborate with supply chain teams to meet demand efficiently.

-Account Oversight: Manage the overall health and performance of Amazon seller accounts and maintain compliance with Amazon policies.

-Relationship Management: Collaborate with internal teams (marketing, finance, logistics) and Amazon support to ensure smooth operations.

-Sponsored Ad Management: Manage PPC campaigns to maximize visibility and ROI.



+Personality Traits

We are looking for someone who demonstrates:

-Adaptability: Thrives in a fast-paced environment and can pivot strategies as needed.

-Innovative Thinking: Creative problem solver with unique solutions.

-Collaborative: Works well in cross-functional teams and values open communication.

-Results-Driven: Sets and achieves ambitious goals.

-Detail-Oriented: Ensures accuracy in listings and account management.

-Accountability: Takes responsibility for actions and outcomes.

-Openness to Feedback: Receptive to constructive feedback and willing to improve.

-Professionalism: Maintains a positive and respectful demeanor.

-Integrity, Honesty, and Trustworthiness: Upholds ethical standards and is someone the team can rely on.



+Experience

-Proven experience as a Product Manager or Amazon Specialist in e-commerce or retail.

-Strong knowledge of product launches, inventory management, supplier sourcing, and listing optimization.

-Demonstrated success in driving sales and revenue growth through Amazon strategies.

-Expertise in Amazon PPC campaigns and SEO optimization.

-Familiarity with Amazon Seller Central and other relevant e-commerce tools.

-Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.



+Requirements

-Excellent verbal and written English

-Reliable internet connection and laptop

-Able to work EST time zone | 10â€“20 hours/week

-Reliable and trustworthy



+What We Offer

-Part-time remote work with flexible hours (3â€“4 hours/day depending on tasks)

-Competitive hourly rate with performance-based raises

-Opportunity to grow within the company based on results



Note: This is a part-time remote position requiring availability from 8 am to 12 pm Eastern Time (US). We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Recruiter
description:
Weâ€™re seeking a high-energy, resourceful, and self-motivated Recruiter who can keep pace with a fast-moving organization. This isnâ€™t your typical recruiter role â€” weâ€™re looking for a proactive talent strategist who can fill diverse seat types (from agents to support and specialized roles), drive full-cycle recruitment, and operate independently with confidence.



A strong plus for this role is experience hiring finance and accounting positions (e.g., bookkeepers, accountants, controllers) and comfortable operating across two LLCs, providing recruitment support for both depending on workload and business priorities. You should also be comfortable recruiting for multiple roles simultaneously, often across different functions and timelines.



What Youâ€™ll Be Doing

As a Recruiter, youâ€™ll play a key role in shaping our workforce by identifying, engaging, and hiring exceptional talent across multiple functions. Youâ€™ll collaborate closely with HR, Operations, and key stakeholders to ensure that every hire aligns with our culture and performance standards.



Your Core Responsibilities

- Lead the end-to-end recruitment process for all seat types â€” from sourcing and screening to offer acceptance and onboarding.

- Craft job descriptions and job ads that attract the right candidates and accurately reflect role requirements.

- Proactively source talent across LinkedIn, job boards, referrals, and social platforms.

- Manage and update candidate pipelines through our ATS with precision and accuracy.

- Conduct screening interviews and assess candidates for skill set, culture fit, and growth potential.

- Hire confidently for finance and accounting roles, including bookkeepers, accountants, and similar functions.

- Recruit for multiple positions concurrently, balancing timelines, priorities, and candidate pipelines.

- Partner with hiring managers to refine job requirements and selection criteria.

- Maintain consistent candidate engagement and timely communication throughout the hiring lifecycle.

- Utilize hiring data to refine sourcing strategies and shorten time-to-fill.

- Provide market insights to support long-term talent planning.

- Operate seamlessly across two LLCs, ensuring hiring pipelines are managed efficiently for both.

- Contribute ideas for improving recruitment processes and campaigns to attract niche and passive talent.



What Youâ€™ll Bring to the Table

- Minimum 4 yearsâ€™ experience in recruitment, headhunting, or talent acquisition within fast-paced environments.

- Proven ability to hire across multiple functions, including operations, support, finance, and accounting roles.

- Comfortable recruiting for multiple openings at the same time across varied departments.

- Experienced in creating job descriptions, ads, and campaigns that target the right audience.

- Exceptional English proficiency (C2 level) â€” strong writing and communication skills.

- Skilled in tools like Google Workspace, Slack, and ATS platforms.

- Comfortable working autonomously and supporting two LLCs with shifting priorities.



Your Key Competencies & Attributes

- Proactivity & Self-Motivation: Stays several steps ahead and takes initiative.

- Resourcefulness & Independence: Handles any type of role with confidence.

- Efficiency & Multitasking: Juggles multiple openings and deadlines seamlessly.

- Creativity & Innovation: Thinks outside the box to source and attract top talent.

- Digital Fluency: Navigates systems and platforms with ease.

- Communication Excellence: Builds rapport and trust with candidates and internal stakeholders.

- Data-Driven Mindset: Uses insights to improve hiring outcomes.

- Flexibility & Resilience: Thrives in dynamic and evolving environments.



Whatâ€™s In It For You

- 100% Remote Work â€” Recruit from anywhere in the Philippines

- Career Growth â€” Opportunity to grow within HR & Talent Acquisition

- Competitive Pay â€” USD $7/hr as an Independent Contractor

- People-Centric Culture â€” We value collaboration, innovation, and teamwork



Ready to Build the Future of our Company?

If youâ€™re a proactive, resourceful, and tech-savvy recruiter who thrives on independence and impact â€” weâ€™d love to hear from you.

title: Account Manager / Campaign Manager (Client Success & Strategy)
description:
About Us

StoryGen (www.storygen.agency/) is a B2B lead generation agency that builds and manages high-performing outbound sales teams for clients across multiple industries. Cold calling is our specialty, powered by smart systems, AI-driven tools, and operational excellence. We help clients turn conversations into predictable revenue.



About the Role

Weâ€™re looking for a proactive Remote Account Manager to own client relationships from onboarding to campaign optimization. Youâ€™ll lead strategy, guide execution, and be the primary bridge between clients and our internal teams. Your mission: ensure every campaign is aligned, optimized, and delivering measurable results.



What Youâ€™ll Do

- Serve as the main point of contact for multiple client accounts, building trust and long-term partnerships.

- Lead client onboarding, strategy sessions, and ongoing performance reviews.

- Develop Ideal Customer Profiles (ICPs), messaging frameworks, and outbound playbooks tailored to each client.

- Craft, test, and refine cold call scripts and outbound
 templates using live BDR feedback and campaign metrics.

- Align and brief BDRs on ICPs, scripts, goals, and expectations for smooth execution.

- Analyze campaign data to identify insights and recommend strategic improvements.

- Continuously optimize targeting, messaging, and workflows for maximum impact.

- Present clear, actionable performance updates to clients.

- Coordinate with the List Building Team to ensure high-quality prospect lists.

- Collaborate with Operations to implement tools, processes, and best practices across campaigns.



What Weâ€™re Looking For

- 1â€“2 years of hands-on B2B cold calling experienceâ€”you know what works on the phone.

- 2+ years in Account Management, Client Success, or Campaign Management (B2B services, lead generation, or sales outsourcing preferred).

- Strong copywriting and scripting skills for cold calls and outbound
s.

- Solid understanding of outbound prospecting, including cold calling, cold
, and ICP development.

- Exceptional communication and relationship management skills.

- Ability to manage multiple client accounts with precision and attention to detail.

- Comfortable working remotely with tools like HubSpot, Slack, Coda, Calendly, Nooks, Aircall, and similar platforms.

- Tech-savvy, with experience leveraging AI tools to streamline workflows.



What We Offer

- Base Pay: USD 1,500/month

- On-Target Earnings: Up to USD 2,000/month (performance-based bonuses)

- 100% remote work with a global, collaborative team

- Clear playbooks, systems, and operational support

- Career growth opportunities as the company scales

- Schedule: Mondayâ€“Friday, 8:30 AMâ€“6:00 PM Eastern Time



How to Apply

We use assessment in our hiring process to promote fairness and reduce bias.



To apply, complete the assessment and submit the following in the same link:

- Your resume

- A link to your internet speed test result

- Record a short Loom audio introduction (guide questions are provided in the link)

title: Signal Processing Developer
description:
Weâ€™re building a camera-based biometric measurement system for a mobile health app. The core technology: remote photoplethysmography (rPPG) â€” using the phone camera to measure heart rate variability without any hardware.



The Technical Challenge



â€¢ React Native (Expo bare workflow) mobile app



â€¢ Fingertip PPG via rear camera + flash (primary method)



â€¢ Face rPPG via front camera (secondary/accessibility method)



â€¢ Real-time signal processing: RGB extraction ? bandpass filter ? POS/CHROM algorithm ? RR intervals ? RMSSD + coherence



â€¢ Signal quality gating (SNR-based: HIGH / MEDIUM / LOW / NONE)



â€¢ Coherence score (0.0â€“1.0) drives real-time Lottie animation parameters



â€¢ Offline-first: all computation on-device, zero API calls, zero per-session cost

title: Virtual Executive Assistant
description:
I'm the founder of a digital growth marketing company that helps mission-driven founders scale their businesses with more ease & less overwhelm - and I'm looking for a small team of highly-skilled Executive Assistants to help take over the marketing and management tasks that make a huge difference in the lives of the people that hire us.



I'm looking for a max of 5 amazing executive assistants available for part-time (potential for full time) with a salary starting at $500 USD per month and with long term success and robust training, moving up to $700 USD per month as an emerging leader in the company.



If you have the following skill sets, I encourage you to apply:



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE:

- Minimum of 3â€“5 years of experience in Digital Marketing, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Content Creation, and Executive Assistant Work (Administrative Tasks, Calendar &
 Management, etc)

Youâ€™re trusted to manage marketing deliverables while providing high-level executive support, keeping priorities organized, systems moving, and leadership focused on growth instead of day-to-day execution. You've done it all from managing schedules to
 & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language



-- 1+ years of experience in Sales Funnels and Shopify

You're a professional who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software



- 1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram,
, Tik Tok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing

You're an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus



- Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)

Youâ€™ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, all that and a bag of chips :-)



- Experience working at a digital/online product/platform: Youâ€™re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and
 service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms arenâ€™t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)



ABOUT YOU:

- â€œYou down with SOP? Yeah you know me!â€â€”Youâ€™re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.

- Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.

- Youâ€™re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.

- Youâ€™re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and youâ€™ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth

- Youâ€™re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you canâ€™t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.

- Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday.

- You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. Youâ€™re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure weâ€™re intentional with our resources.

- Youâ€™re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.



If youâ€™re nodding your head â€œYesâ€ to the above, proceed below to apply.



PERKS:

I'm committed to setting our staff up for success with access to trainings that will certify your skills in:

- Task & Calendar Management

- Launch/Sales Strategy Planning

- Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)

- Social Media Management

- Digital Media Marketing (Including
 and SMS Marketing)

- Lead Generation



After one week of training and assessment, you're officially certified under our internal training program, which means hitting the ground running with your new skills. Perks include:

- Part time work hours

- Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)

- Starting Salary at $500 USD a month ($6000 USD annual)

- Internal certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career (I have helped clients amass at least $10M from the same digital growth marketing strategies I will require you to learn)



Interested? Please reply to this post with the secret keyword "APPLES" so I know you can pay attention to detail - from there, I'll let you know next steps if you qualify.

title: Project Manager for Digital Marketing
description:
Job Title: Project Manager

Company: No Joke Marketing

Location: Remote



About Us



At No Joke Marketing, we donâ€™t just "tweak" things; we build automated digital marketing systems that drive real, bottom-line results. We are a high-performing team of "futurists" who take our clients' growth as seriously as they do. While we have a strong presence in the childcare niche, this role is specifically for our non-childcare division, working across a diverse range of clients and industries.



The Role



We are seeking a high-level Project Manager to lead digital marketing initiatives from ideation to execution. You will be the central point of coordination, ensuring that complex, multi-channel campaigns are delivered on time, within budget, and at the highest standard of excellence.

This is not a traditional "task-tracking" role. We are looking for a strategic leader who can leverage AI tools to optimize workflows and drive data-backed decision-making.



Key Responsibilities

Strategic Execution: Translate high-level marketing goals into executable project roadmaps and campaign sprints.

AI Integration: Implement AI-driven solutions to automate routine coordination, reporting, and campaign optimization.

Cross-Functional Leadership: Orchestrate workflows between creative, media, and tech teams to ensure brand consistency and performance.

Client Management: Act as the primary liaison for diverse clients, defining project scope and managing expectations across various niches.

Performance Tracking: Monitor KPIs, resource capacity, and ROI to ensure every project moves the needle for our clients.



What You Bring (Qualifications)

Management Tenure: A minimum of 5 years of proven project management experience within a fast-paced digital marketing agency environment.

AI Expertise: Deep familiarity with modern AI tools and a demonstrated ability to apply them to marketing workflows and data analysis.

Niche Versatility: Proven ability to quickly master and adapt to various industries and client types outside of the childcare sector.

Technical Proficiency: Advanced mastery of project management software (e.g., Asana) and marketing automation platforms.

A "No Joke" Attitude: You are a proactive problem-solver with a bias toward action and a passion for growth.



Technical Requirements

As this is a 100% remote position, you must have a reliable home office setup that meets the following minimum specifications:

Computer: High-performance PC or Mac with at least 16GB RAM and a modern processor (i7/M1 or equivalent).

Internet: Stable, high-speed connection with at least 50 Mbps download and 20 Mbps upload (hardwired Ethernet preferred over Wi-Fi).

Backup: A secondary internet source (hotspot) and power backup (UPS) to ensure zero downtime during client meetings or campaign launches.

Audio/Visual: Professional-grade webcam and noise-canceling headset for high-quality Zoom communication.

title: React Native Developer
description:
Weâ€™re building Ascen BreathWorx â€” a nervous system regulation app for justice-involved individuals and their families. The app uses the phone camera to measure heart rate variability in real time, translates that data into a living character animation, and guides users through breathwork sessions that produce measurable, visible nervous system regulation.



This Is a 2-Year Opportunity Phase 1 (Febâ€“Mar): MVP build â€” camera biometrics, session engine, offline storage, county demo Phase 2 (Aprâ€“Jun): Pilot features â€” 250 sessions, scoring system, family features, LightBridge SMS Phase 3 (Julâ€“Dec): Full platform â€” family co-regulation, smart home integration, community features Phase 4 (2027): Scale â€” App Store launch, HIPAA hardening, 500+ users, multi-facility deployment The right person owns this codebase for 2 years. Salary grows with the platform.



What Youâ€™ll Build (Phases 2â€“4 â€” Ongoing)



â€¢ 250-session content library with Acts Iâ€“IV navigation



â€¢ Mastery unit scoring system (12+ unit types, anti-gaming logic)



â€¢ Vault â€” journaling with session-linked prompts



â€¢ Healing Pod â€” family awareness registration



â€¢ LightBridge â€” automated SMS/email to family (Twilio)



â€¢ Spiral staircase progress visualization



â€¢ County reporting dashboard (web portal + PDF export)



â€¢ Smart home integration â€” lighting events on session completion



â€¢ Family co-regulation features and shared sessions



â€¢ App Store submission (iOS + Android)



â€¢ HIPAA compliance hardening

title: Remote Bookkeeper (Sage Experience Required)
description:
Location: Remote (Work-From-Home, Philippines)

Employment Type: Remote

Compensation: Competitive based on experience



About the Role

We are looking for a detail-oriented, reliable, and experienced Bookkeeper with proven experience using Sage accounting software to manage and maintain accurate financial records. You will be responsible for daily bookkeeping tasks and supporting financial operations for our company. Previous job posts on OnlineJobs.ph with Sage requirements show that companies expect thorough bookkeeping knowledge and software proficiency.



 Key Responsibilities

- Perform day-to-day bookkeeping using Sage (e.g., Sage50, Sage Business Cloud)

 -Record and categorize financial transactions accurately

 -Reconcile bank accounts, credit card statements, and ledgers

 -Prepare monthly financial summaries and reports

 -Manage accounts payable and receivable

 -Assist with VAT/GST tax filings and statutory requirements

- Support budgeting, cash flow monitoring, and forecasting

- Ensure accurate and compliant financial records

- Communicate with team/clients regarding financial matters



Requirements

-Proven experience as a Bookkeeper or similar role 

-Hands-on experience with Sage accounting software

-Strong understanding of basic accounting and bookkeeping principles

-Proficient in Microsoft Excel

-Excellent attention to detail and organization skills

-Strong English communication (written & verbal)

-Ability to work independently and manage time effectively

-Reliable internet connection and suitable home workspace



Preferred (but not required)

 -Experience with other accounting platforms (QuickBooks, Xero)

 -Experience supporting US/Canada clients and US accounting standards

 -Experience preparing financial statements and VAT/GST returns



Benefits

 -Work remotely full time

 -Competitive pay, negotiable based on experience

 -Opportunities for professional growth and training

 -Supportive and flexible work environment



 How to Apply:

Please send your application with:

1. Updated resume/CV

2. Your hourly rate or expected salary

3. Brief cover letter highlighting your Sage experience and bookkeeping skills



Subject line: Remote Bookkeeper (Sage)

Send to :

title: L2 Tech Support Engineer
description:
Dear Technology Lover!

We're a small (but VERY efficient) 20-year-old MSP based in Arizona.

As a small company. we're VERY employee-focused, and believe that our tea
mbers are our MOST IMPORTANT ASSET!



Here are some of the things you can expect from working with us:

â€¢ Ongoing (monthly) manager review and feedback- you should never guess where you are "standing" and what you, AND THE COMPANY, can do better!

â€¢ Paid certifications- we will pay for your courses, and tests and allocate time during business hours to help you achieve your desired goals

â€¢ Paid Time Off- it's important to us that you are happy, healthy, and have a work-life balance!

â€¢ Bonuses- when the company wins- you win!

â€¢ Raises- As we grow, we believe you should as well. We have to stay competitive as an employer to retain our awesome employees!

â€¢ Opportunities to grow- In our industry, we can't be on "cruise control"... We need to push our tea
mbers to stay ahead of the technology curve. Help you continually to sharpen your skills with a focus on your career aspirations.

â€¢ Paid sick days- We understand life happens. We don't want you to feel that you have to drag yourself to work sick if your body tells you to relax...



You're the right fit if you:

â€¢ LOVE learning, working with, and experimenting with new technology

â€¢ Get excited when you save someone's day and provide great service

â€¢ Are a hard-working fun person, and see yourself being in the IT industry for the foreseeable future

â€¢ Want to work in a GROWING environment, with STABLE income, Bonuses, and a great attitude!

â€¢ Want the opportunity to advance and learn more!



Some of the responsibilities that your position will include are:

Helpdesk (mostly escalations, but some basic if needed), cyber security related tasks/ audits, cloud hosting and virtualization (HyperV, SonicWall, VPN), MS365 management and automation, BCDR (Axcient), networking (Unifi, Sonicwall), IT projects, Servers maintenance (Windows only), scripts creation, testing new technology and other tasks related to IT.



IMPORTANT:

This position requires AT LEAST 2 years of MSP experience and at least 2 years experience in an L2 position, supervisory, or lead role. 100% clean background check, highly organized, technologically savvy, and can work diligently with little 
veral hiring steps will take place to verify the above requirements, including reference checking, employment verification, technical testing, and more.



Minimum technical level that you will need to be able to pass a test on:

â€¢ Explaining to a non-technical person what the "cloud" is

â€¢ Consulting with a new client on what BCDR solution you would recommend to an SMB, and why

â€¢ Explaining what the differences are between traditional anti-virus and XDR

â€¢ Creating a new Virtual Machine on Hyper-V host, from an ISO file located on a different computer on the network.

â€¢ Explaining the differences and commonalities between SharePoint and OneDrive.

â€¢ Creating an Intune policy that will install Firefox on an Azure-joined VM, and make Firefox the default browser, with the specific home page we'll provide to you during the test.

â€¢ Several other situational and technical questions.

â€¢ CCNA certificate candidates preferred but not required.



MORE DETAILS:

â€¢ A PRE-EMPLOYMENT BACKGROUND CHECK is performed (at our expense). You must have 100% clean background check. Please do not apply if you don't have 100% clean background check.

â€¢ Personality is KEY for us. We are looking for an easy-going, yet professional, friendly and HONEST person.

â€¢ You will be working from home. This means you must have a quiet work environment and no excessive background noise.

â€¢ FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET SERVICE IS REQUIRED With at least 100Mbps download speed  20+ Mbps upload speed.

â€¢ As part of this position requirement, you must have a computer that will be used exclusively for your work with us. This means we will be installing our security software on that computer, will remove admin rights from you, and monitor/ control it for security and compliance reasons. In return, we will pay you additional â€œrentâ€ fees, on top of your salary, in the amount of several hundred dollars. Details about this â€œrentalâ€ will be discussed during your second interview. There are minimum requirements that your computer must have, in order to be employed with us. You must have a Computer/Laptop with at least i5 minimum 9th gen processor (preferably a newer one) with 16 GB RAM or more or Ryzen 5/7 (MUST include TPM support) as well as Windows 11 OS.

â€¢ You must have recently worked on a night shift for 2 consecutive years or more.

â€¢ We evaluate/ review employees monthly and provide consistent feedback.

â€¢ We offer raises and bonuses according to performance, certifications, attitude, and customer reviews twice/ year.

â€¢ Your manager (our IT director) will create a roadmap for your "KPIs" and certifications track. We always push our team to earn certifications and additional knowledge â€“ even allowing â€œdisconnect study timeâ€ during business hours!

â€¢ On-call rotation (after-hours) for a week at a time, once every 4-5 weeks. It's VERY rare that we get calls after-hours (the average is only twice/ year!).

â€¢ We're closed on major US holidays, and at the completion of the first 3 months of employment, you'll qualify for paid holidays.

â€¢ Work hours are Mon-Fri at 8 am till 5:30 pm (UTC-07:00 , MST, Arizona time zone)

â€¢ Every 4 to 5 weeks, you'll be working 1/2 day on a Saturday (project work/catch-up work) and get 1/2 day off the week after

â€¢ Mandatory 1-hour lunch and additional breaks (as you need those) throughout the day.

â€¢ Further details and information will be discussed with qualified candidates.

title: QA Associate
description:
WHAT TO EXPECT:

Headquartered in California, Wonderist Agency is a leading U.S. dental marketing agency trusted by over 1,000 clients in all 50 states. We build high-performing websites, run targeted digital campaigns, and deliver measurable growth for dental practices in the healthcare space. Our team includes local Californians as well as skilled global talent in Mexico, the Philippines and other regions, working together to provide industry-leading results.



JOB DESCRIPTION: 

The heart of a QA Associate's role is ensuring that every website we launch meets our exacting standards and exceeds client expectations. You will serve as the final line of defense before websites go live, meticulously reviewing completed Webflow websites against comprehensive QA checklists while using your own judgment to catch issues that might not be explicitly outlined. In this role, you will be the guardian of quality, ensuring that our reputation for delivering stunning, error-free websites remains untarnished.



As QA Associate, you will review client-submitted materials including Google Drive folders, onboarding forms, and asset lists to verify that projects are completed exactly to client specifications. You'll work closely with our Web Development and Web Design teams, providing constructive feedback and tracking error rates to drive continuous improvement. Your attention to detail and commitment to excellence will directly impact client satisfaction and our team's professional growth.



WHAT YOU'LL DO:

-Serve as the final line of defense before website launches, ensuring every site meets our exacting standards and exceeds client expectations

- Meticulously review completed Webflow websites against comprehensive QA checklists while using your judgment to catch   issues that aren't explicitly outlined

- Act as the guardian of quality, protecting our reputation for delivering stunning, error-free websites

- Review client-submitted materials (Google Drive folders, onboarding forms, asset lists) to verify projects are completed exactly to client specifications

- Work closely with our Web Development and Web Design teams, providing constructive feedback that drives continuous improvement

- Track error rates and quality metrics to identify trends and opportunities for team growth

- Directly impact client satisfaction and our team's professional development through your attention to detail and commitment to excellence



KEY SKILLS REQUIRED: 

- Obsessive Attention to Detail: QA Associates must have an exceptional eye for detail and the patience to methodically review every element of a website. You'll need to spot the smallest inconsistenciesâ€”a pixel-off alignment, an inconsistent font weight, a broken anchor linkâ€”that others might miss. Your commitment to perfection ensures that our clients receive flawless deliverables.

- Strong Judgment and Decision-Making: While checklists provide structure, you must also exercise sound judgment to identify issues that aren't explicitly defined. You'll need to distinguish between acceptable variations and true errors, know when to flag something versus fix it yourself, and determine when an issue requires escalation versus simple documentation.

- Technical Proficiency with CMS Platforms: You should be comfortable navigating content management systems, understanding how websites are structured, and identifying technical issues like broken links, improper redirects, missing alt text, or responsive design problems. Experience with Webflow is a bonus, but experience QAing websites in WordPress or similar platforms is highly valuable.

- Clear and Constructive Communication: When documenting errors, you must provide clear, specific, and actionable feedback that helps developers understand and correct issues efficiently. Your communication style should be constructive rather than critical, focusing on solutions and continuous improvement rather than blame.

- Data-Driven and Analytical: You'll be responsible for tracking quality metrics and identifying trends in error rates. You should be comfortable working with data, generating reports, and translating numbers into actionable insights that drive team performance improvements.

- Systematic and Process-Oriented: QA work requires a methodical approach and the discipline to follow established processes consistently. You'll need to work through checklists thoroughly, document findings systematically, and maintain organized records that can be referenced for training or auditing purposes.

- Collaborative Team Player: While QA involves independent review work, you'll collaborate closely with developers, designers, and project managers. You should be comfortable giving feedback, answering questions about quality standards, and working as a partner in delivering exceptional client experiences.



PERSONALITY MUSTS:

Our perfect fit is someone who genuinely enjoys finding errorsâ€”not in a "gotcha" way, but because you take pride in delivering perfect work and helping others grow. You should have a curious, investigative mindset that drives you to look beyond the obvious and question whether something could be better. Someone who is diplomatic and constructive when providing feedback, understanding that mistakes are learning opportunities. You should be self-motivated and able to work independently while still being a supportive teammate. Integrity, consistency, and a genuine commitment to excellence are things we love and admire.



OTHER DETAILS/REQUIRMENT

Full Time Daily Hours to Follow Pacific Standard Time (9am - 5pm PST)

Reliable high-speed internet to support daily video calls

title: Web Page Tester (E-commerce QA)
description:
Weâ€™re looking for a detail-oriented Web Page Tester to review and validate the functionality and accuracy of our website. Your primary role is to simulate real customer behavior and verify that everything works exactly as advertised. This covers everything from collections and product pages to cart discounts and checkout logic. In addition, you'll be testing new features/functions that we introduce.



Very little training will be provided. For the most part, you are expected to understand basic terms and act on instructions immediately. Tasks will be assigned in batches (weekly or every 2 weeks). Add .. to the end of every sentence in your response.



Key Responsibilities



Product and Collections Page Functionality Testing

- PDP â€” Carousel, image render, layout, pricing, variant selections, flow, etc.

- Collections â€” Image render, layout, pagination, sort function, subcategories, etc.

- Test add-to-cart and buy-now flows.

- Validate mobile and desktop behavior using different browsers.

- Test multiple quantities.

- Test duplicate purchases.

- Test edge cases (i.e., clicking add to cart multiple times rapidly to see if it creates errors or inconsistencies)



Promotion & Discount Validation â€” Check if promotions apply correctly

- â€œBuy 4, Get 11% Offâ€

- Bundle discounts

- Coupon discounts

- Confirm discounts appear in cart and checkout.

- Identify stacking or non-stacking issues (products on clearance, general coupon discounts, shipping discounts)

- Luxe view bundling, verifying correct item offerings and pricing (to be explained during onboarding)



Data & Content Accuracy

- Product descriptions

- Text in image assets

- Identify broken links or missing images on any page

- Title, description, and images match

- Flag pricing mismatches (collections page vs. landing page vs. product detail pages)

Testing shipping rate calculations



Documentation

- Record findings in a spreadsheet.

- Screenshots, screen recordings, or links where the issue can be found.

- If applicable, include steps to recreate the issue.



Requirements

- Can speak English well

- Strong attention to detail

- Familiarity with how websites function (basic level)

- Comfortable navigating product pages and checkout flows

- Able to follow both structured and unstructured tests

- Reliable internet connection

- Access to multiple test devices (smartphone and computer)



Nice to have:

- Prior QA or website testing experience

- E-commerce familiarity (Shopify, Magento, etc.)

- Can follow EST hours



To apply, please send a response (no more than 350 words) that includes your resume (highlighting any website testing experience), your internet speed, your availability (days + hours) and why we should choose you.



Qualified applicants will be given a short test to evaluate attention to detail and precision, and those who pass will be scheduled for an interview with upper management.

title: Go High Level Automation & Marketing Specialist
description:
Job Title: Go High Level Automation & Marketing Specialist

Location: Remote

Job Type: Full-Time/Part-Time



Overview

 We are a rapidly expanding business looking to streamline operations and improve client management through automation. We are in need of a dedicated and skilled GoHighLevel Automation Specialist to manage our CRM, optimize business processes, and implement automated marketing strategies. If you are passionate about business automation and client relationship management, we want to hear from you!



Job Details

As a GoHighLevel Automation Specialist, you will be responsible for configuring and managing the GoHighLevel platform to ensure seamless lead management, automation, and marketing efforts. You will work to improve operational efficiency, drive business growth, and enhance the client experience.



What Youâ€™ll be Doing

CRM Management & Automation

Manage and configure GoHighLevel CRM to ensure smooth workflows and client management.

Create automated funnels, workflows, and sequences to nurture leads and improve conversion rates.

Develop strategies for lead generation and capture using GoHighLevelâ€™s tools.



Lead & Client Management

Implement lead scoring and segmentation to ensure proper follow-up and lead nurturing.

Integrate GoHighLevel with other tools (Zapier,
 platforms and other automation platforms) to streamline communication and data flow.

Provide ongoing management and updates to client profiles and leads in the CRM.



Marketing & Sales Automation

Set up and automate marketing campaigns 
, SMS, social media) to reach the right audience at the right time.

Design and implement funnels for client acquisition, retention, and upselling.

Track campaign performance and adjust strategies to improve results.



Client Communication & Engagement

Set up automated text,
, and voi
 campaigns to maintain constant engagement with clients.

Design workflows to keep clients informed and engaged through automated touchpoints.

Provide analytics and reporting on the effectiveness of communication campaigns.



Design & Development

Create logos, branding assets, and visually compelling landing pages using GoHighLevelâ€™s design tools.

Build fully functional landing pages tailored to different business lines and campaigns.

Assist with the branding and user experience for multiple departments and initiatives.



Training & Support Across Departments

Train internal teams across various business lines in using GoHighLevel for their specific duties and tasks.

Create step-by-step guides, SOPs, or training sessions to help others onboard and adopt the platform effectively.



E-commerce Integration (Shopify)

Support the Shopify Manager and HR Team by building and integrating stores or websites directly from GoHighLevel.

Help create automations that connect store operations, client communications, and post-sale follow-ups.



What You Bring to the Role

Proven experience working with GoHighLevel CRM or similar platforms.

Expertise in setting up automated workflows, funnels, and sequences.

Strong understanding of lead generation, marketing automation, and client management processes.

Proficiency in data analysis and campaign reporting to track and optimize performance.

Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and meet deadlines.

Experience in integration with other platforms such as Zapier, Google Sheets, and
 marketing tools.

Excellent organizational, communication, and problem-solving skills.

Experience in designing marketing materials or campaigns (preferred).





What You Can Expect

Competitive pay based on experience and skillset.

Base pay starting at $5.00 per hour.

Flexible work schedule.

Opportunities for growth and development within the business.

A supportive, dynamic, and collaborative work environment.



About Our Company

We are a growing business dedicated to delivering top-quality service to our clients. Our mission is to automate and streamline business operations to increase efficiency, improve client experiences, and scale our growth. We are looking for a motivated and resourceful individual to join our team and help us achieve our goals.



If you have the necessary skills and experience for this role, we encourage you to apply and be part of our innovative team!



Ready to apply? Start here:
salary: Base pay starting at $5.00 per hour

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
Virtual Assistant (Part-Time, U.S. Hours)

Hours: 20 hours/week (flexible scheduling within U.S. Pacific business hours) Rate: $10â€“$12/hour USD (based on experience), paid electronically Type: Independent contractor, long-term engagement Start: Immediate



What You'll Be Doing

- Tradeshow & Event Coordination

- Research and book flights, hotels, and ground transportation for 3â€“5 tradeshows per year.  

- $150 bonus for a completed tradeshow that goes smoothly.

- Coordinate booth design, ordering, and shipping logistics

- Work with our team on layouts for handouts, banners, and promotional materials (t-shirts, swag)

- Create shareable itineraries of each tradeshow with all details for each attendee

- Administrative & Operations Support

- Vendor research and quote comparison

- Light bookkeeping, coordination, and invoice tracking (due date).

- Calendar management and scheduling

- Document formatting

- General organizational support as needs arise



Who We're Looking For

Must-haves:

- Completely fluent English â€” spoken and written. You'll be communicating directly with U.S. vendors, hotels, conference organizers, and our team. We need someone whose English is indistinguishable from a native speaker in professional contexts.

- Available during U.S. Pacific business hours (8am - 4pm as needed). We understand this means evening/night hours in the Philippines â€” this must genuinely work for your schedule.

- Familiarity with U.S. business practices â€” you understand how U.S. vendor relationships, invoicing, booking systems, and professional communication work. Prior experience working directly with U.S. companies is required.

- Highly organized and proactive â€” you don't wait to be told what's next. You track deadlines, send reminders, and flag issues before they become problems.

- Reliable internet and quiet workspace â€” this is non-negotiable for calls and consistent availability.

- Willing to Work with AI / LLMs â€” for refinement of
 communications, etc.



Strong pluses:

- Experience coordinating U.S. tradeshows or events

- Tech-savvy â€” comfortable learning new software quickly



Compensation

- Base rate: $10â€“$12/hour USD depending on experience

- Tradeshow bonus: $150 per tradeshow you coordinate end-to-end that runs smoothly.

- Annual review: We revisit rate annually

- Stability: We're looking for a long-term relationship, not a short-term project



How to Apply

Please send:

- A short introduction about yourself and why this role interests you

- Your relevant experience â€” especially anything involving U.S. companies, or event coordination

- Your English proficiency level and any certifications (IELTS, TOEFL, etc.) if available

- Your availability during U.S. Pacific hours (what hours can you consistently work?)

- Your expected hourly rate

- We respond to every qualified application within 1 business day.

?

?

RiseNF is a newly formed economic advocacy alliance focused on revenue fairness, transparency, and private-sector growth in Niagara Falls, NY.

This is a civic movement platform built around:

 capture integration (Mailchimp / Klaviyo / similar)

title: Mobile App Dev Team (React Native) â€“ Finish MVP & App Store Launch
description:
### **Project Overview**



We have an **existing mobile application codebase** that is partially implemented. We are seeking an **experienced engineering team** to take over the repository, complete remaining work, and deliver a **production-ready MVP**.



This is a **takeover and finish** engagement. Not greenfield.



No product vision, business model, or proprietary logic will be shared publicly. Full context is provided only during interviews and under NDA.



---



### **What We Are Looking For**



- A **small, established engineering team (2â€“4 people)**

- One designated **technical lead** responsible for delivery and communication

- Proven experience shipping **mobile apps to the Apple App Store and Google Play Store**

- Ability to work cleanly within an existing codebase

- Clear written communication and ownership



Solo developers will not be considered unless operating under a structured delivery framework.



---



### **Tech Context (High-Level Only)**



- Cross-platform mobile app (React Native / Expo or equivalent)

- Backend and payments already partially integrated

- Hosted infrastructure already in place



Detailed architecture is shared only after initial qualification.



---



### **Scope of Work**



- Review existing repository

- Identify and complete remaining MVP gaps

- Stabilize builds

- Prepare production releases

- Deploy the app under client-owned accounts



---



### **MVP Acceptance (Non-Negotiable)**



The MVP is considered **complete and accepted only when**:



- The app is **approved and publicly downloadable** from the **Apple App Store (iOS)**

- The app is **approved and publicly downloadable** from the **Google Play Store (Android)**

- The app runs on real devices with **no developer tools or setup required**

- All source code, credentials, deployments, and accounts are fully transferred to the client



Anything short of this does **not** qualify as delivery.



---



### **Engagement & Payment Structure**



- Fixed-fee engagement

- Short **takeover audit** before full engagement

- Milestone check-ins

- Final payment released **only after MVP acceptance**



Clear agreement required before work begins.



---



### **Evaluation Process**



Shortlisted teams will be asked to:



- Review the repository

- Provide a written plan to reach MVP acceptance

- Confirm timeline and responsibilities



This is used to confirm **fit and competence**



---



### **How to Apply**



Please include:



- Examples of mobile apps your team has shipped to app stores

- Team structure and roles

- Confirmation that you understand and accept the MVP acceptance criteria



---

title: Senior Google Ads (PPC) Strategist â€“ Dietary Supplement & Health Brands
description:
ABOUT US



Nutra Marketers (
) is a specialized marketing agency working exclusively with dietary supplement and health brands.



We help direct-to-consumer (DTC) supplement companies scale profitably using Google Ads, Google Shopping, and AI-driven performance strategies that are compliant with Googleâ€™s policies for regulated health products.



- We do not work in multiple niches. Supplements and health brands are our only focus.



THE ROLE (READ THIS CAREFULLY)



- This is NOT a junior role and NOT a task-based execution job.

- We are not PPC experts â€” and thatâ€™s intentional. 

- We want someone who knows more than we do, can lead PPC strategy, and can tell us what to do, not wait for instructions.

- This role combines strategist + executor.



You will:



- Design PPC strategies

- Build campaigns from scratch

- Optimize performance daily

- Monitor compliance in a restricted niche

- Explain why decisions are made

- Improve results continuously



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES - Client Google Ads Campaigns (DTC Supplements). 



You will fully own Google Ads performance for supplement and health brands, including:



- Building Google Ads accounts from scratch

- Designing account structures for:

     - Search campaigns

     - Google Shopping 

     - AI and Performance Max

- Keyword research specific to dietary supplements & health products

- Writing compliant, high-converting ad copy

- Conversion tracking setup & validation:

     - Google Ads conversions

     - GA4

     - Google Tag Manager

- Bid strategy management:

     - Manual bidding (when appropriate)

     - Max Conversions

     - Target CPA

     - Target ROAS

- Ongoing optimization:

     - Search term analysis

     - Negative keyword strategy

     - Ad creative testing

     - Landing page feedback & CRO insights

- Monitoring spend efficiency, CPA, ROAS, and conversion quality

- Ensuring policy compliance in a restricted niche



GOOGLE AI & AUTOMATION EXPERTISE - You must have a strong working understanding of Googleâ€™s AI-driven ad systems and how to use them strategically, not blindly.



This includes:



Performance Max:

- Structuring PMax campaigns correctly

     - Using audience signals effectively

     - Understanding asset group optimization

     - Knowing when PMax is appropriate vs when it is not

- AI-Driven Bidding & Optimization:

     - Max Conversions

     - Target CPA / ROAS

     - Knowing how data volume impacts AI performance

- Creative & Asset Automation:

     - Feeding Google high-quality signals

     - Controlling creative outputs to avoid waste

- Ability to explain:

     - How Googleâ€™s AI makes decisions

     - When to trust automation

     - When to override or constrain it



We are looking for someone who can leverage Googleâ€™s AI intelligently, not someone who simply â€œturns it on and hopes for the best.â€



INTERNAL NUTRA MARKETERS PPC (B2B LEAD GENERATION) - You will also manage Nutra Marketersâ€™ own Google Ads account, focused on B2B lead generation.



Example keywords our cleints search include:



â€œsupplement marketing agencyâ€

â€œPPC for supplementsâ€

â€œdietary supplement advertisingâ€

â€œGoogle Ads for supplement brandsâ€



Responsibilities include:



- Building and optimizing B2B search campaigns

- Lead quality optimization (not just volume)

- Conversion tracking for:

     - Form fills

     - Booked calls

- Cost-per-lead optimization

- Ongoing testing and refinement of messaging

- Reporting on performance and pipeline impact



STRATEGY, OWNERSHIP & LEADERSHIP - You will not be micromanaged.



You are expected to:



- Develop PPC strategies independently

- Identify problems and opportunities proactively

- Justify decisions using data

- Recommend changes without being asked

- Explain strategy and performance clearly to non-experts

- Continuously improve efficiency and results



REPORTING AND COMMUNICATION



- Clear weekly and monthly reporting

- Performance insights (whatâ€™s working, whatâ€™s not, and why)

- Action plans for optimization

- communication with leadership



PAID TEST PROJECT (FINAL APPLICANTS) - Final candidates will complete a paid test project:



- Audit:

     - One client account

     - One Nutra Marketers account

- Identify:

     - What is working

     - What is not

     - Missed opportunities

- Provide:

     - A clear optimization roadmap

     - Strategy explanations

     - Expected impact



This is a real-world evaluation of strategic thinking and execution ability.



COMPENSATION & BENEFITS



- Part-time to start

- Opportunity to move to full-time

- Competitive pay based on experience

- Paid holidays

- Health benefits

- 13th month pay

- Long-term growth opportunity

- High autonomy and trust



HOW TO APPLY - Please include:



1. Brief introduction

2. Your hourly rate

3. Years of Google Ads experience

4. Types of accounts managed

5. Experience with Performance Max & AI-driven bidding

6. Any supplement or health experience

7. Example results (CPA, ROAS, scale achieved)



Thank you for your time and consideration. 



Jacob

Position Title: Virtual Assistant & Cold Caller â€“ HVAC Industry

Company: Reliance Home Comfort

| Responsibilities



Research & Depth

nts for pattern interrupts

â€œWhat Really Happens If You Sleep 6 Hours Every Nightâ€

title: Social Media Manager (SMM) â€“ AI News & Short-Form Content Execution Focus
description:
Social Media Manager (SMM) â€“ AI News & Short-Form Content Execution Focus

Type: Full-time

Location: Remote / WFH



OVERVIEW:

Weâ€™re looking for a Social Media Manager to run and grow AI-themed social media pages focused on trending artificial intelligence news, tools, and updates.



This role is execution-focused. You will monitor AI news sources, tech publications, hashtags, and competing AI theme pages daily. Your job is to identify high-performing or trending topics, verify information using original sources, and transform those topics into optimized short-form content using AI tools and strong visual design.



You must be highly organized, fast-moving, and comfortable using ChatGPT and other AI tools to restructure and improve contentâ€”not just copy it. Strong Canva and CapCut skills are non-negotiable.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Monitor AI news daily (e.g., major tech publications such as  TechCrunch, official company blogs, product launch announcements, etc.)

- Track trending AI hashtags, viral posts, and competing AI theme pages across TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and X

- Identify high-performing topics early and turn them into optimized content quickly

- Verify claims using original sources before publishing

- Use ChatGPT and other AI tools to:

- Check accuracy of trending posts

- Improve hooks and structure

- Generate carousel outlines (e.g., 8â€“10 slides)

- Refine captions for engagement

- Create branded carousel posts using Canva

- Edit short-form videos using CapCut for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts

- Repurpose content across platforms while maintaining consistent branding

- Maintain a consistent daily posting schedule

- Track basic analytics (views, saves, shares, watch time) and identify patterns

- Continuously improve formatting, hooks, and storytelling to increase engagement



REQUIREMENTS:

- Advanced Canva and CapCut skills (must be clear in portfolio)

- Strong understanding of short-form content structure (hooks, pacing, retention)

- Ability to monitor multiple AI news sources and theme pages daily

- Ability to quickly summarize and simplify tech/AI news

- Strong ChatGPT prompting skills (editing, restructuring, improving clarity and engagement)

- Ability to fact-check information using primary sources

- Fast turnaround time and ability to produce content consistently

- Organized workflow and ability to follow brand guidelines

- Strong English writing skills



TO APPLY, YOU MUST-HAVE THE FOLLOWING APPLICATION ITEMS:

1. Portfolio demonstrating social media pages, branded content, carousel posts, and short-form videos (link or file)

2. Latest resume

3. Required for this role:

- Submit 1 sample AI carousel (8â€“10 slides) based on a recent AI news story >> send the link along with your portfolio & resume

- Include the original source link

- Briefly explain how you optimized the content for engagement



!! Applications without a portfolio and sample content will not be considered. !!
